description:
Aggregates statistics over the spatial dimensions. This process passes a list of values to the reducer. 

 The results are computed dividing the input X/Y grid into xDim/yDim non-overlapping windows and applying the reducer process to each window.
 If X and Y are not multiple of xDim/yDim NaNs padding before the computation is applied.

parameters.name: boundary
parameters.description:
Operation to apply if X/Y are not multiple of xDim/yDim. Options are:

- trim: trim the datacube to fit window dimensions. 

- pad: pad the datacube with NaNs to fit window dimensions.

parameters.name: reducer
parameters.description: A reducer to be applied on all values of each geometry. A reducer is a single process such as ``mean()`` or a set of processes, which computes a single value for a list of values, see the category 'reducer' for such processes.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: An array with elements of any type.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Additional data passed by the user.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Additional data to be passed to the reducer.

returns.description:
A vector data cube with the computed results.

X and Y dimensions will be smaller compared to the input datacube.
